pytket.cirq¶

Module for conversion between Google Cirq and \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) primitives.

pytket.cirq.cirq_to_tk(circuit: cirq.circuits.circuit.Circuit) → pytket._circuit.Circuit¶

Converts a Cirq Circuit to a \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Circuit object.

Return type:Circuit
Parameters:circuit (Circuit) – The input Cirq Circuit
Raises:NotImplementedError – If the input contains a Cirq Circuit operation which is not yet supported by pytket
Returns:The \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Circuit corresponding to the input circuit
pytket.cirq.tk_to_cirq(tkcirc: Union[pytket._circuit.Circuit, pytket._routing.PhysicalCircuit], indexed_qubits: List[cirq.ops.raw_types.Qid] = None) → cirq.circuits.circuit.Circuit¶

Converts a \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Circuit object to a Cirq Circuit.

Return type:Circuit
Parameters:tkcirc – The input \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Circuit
Returns:The Cirq Circuit corresponding to the input circuit
pytket.cirq.get_grid_qubits(arc: pytket._routing.SquareGrid, nodes: Iterator[int]) → List[cirq.devices.grid_qubit.GridQubit]¶

Gets a list of :py:class:GridQubit` s corresponding to the qubit nodes provided on the given Architecture.

Return type:

List
Parameters:
  • arc (SquareGrid) – The grid Architecture
  • nodes (Iterator) – An iterator of node index values
Returns:

The list of qubits
pytket.cirq.xmon_to_arc(xmon: cirq.google.xmon_device.XmonDevice) → pytket._routing.Architecture¶

Generates a \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Architecture object for a Cirq XmonDevice .

Return type:Architecture
Parameters:xmon (XmonDevice) – The device to convert
Returns:The corresponding \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Architecture
